modules.description: Writes data to a file in batches using a specified filename. Accepts multidimensional arrays with C layout and appends them to the output stream. Finalizes the write operation and releases resources when completed.

Reads and writes binary data from/to NPZ files, supporting direct storage into pre-allocated bigarrays. Operates on strings and Bigarrays with optional suffix-based key filtering. Used for loading and saving numerical arrays in machine learning workflows.

Handles tensor arithmetic with support for GPU acceleration via CUDA streams, offering element-wise operations, reductions, and memory management functions. Operates on multidimensional arrays with flexible precision settings, including mixed-precision computations. Used to optimize numerical simulations and machine learning workloads requiring high-performance tensor manipulations.

writes and reads binary data in NPZ format, handling multidimensional arrays with C layout and supporting batched output and direct bigarray storage. operates on strings and bigarrays, allowing key-filtered access and efficient memory management. can append arrays to files, finalize writes, and load arrays into pre-allocated buffers. enables seamless integration with machine learning pipelines by preserving data structure and layout.
